title: Calories in 80/20 Ground Beef
meta_description: Learn calories in 8020 ground beef per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition facts for easy tracking.
assumptions: Raw, 80% lean / 20% fat ground beef; USDA standard values, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content accuracy, grinding method, and cooking; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of raw 80/20 ground beef has 254 kcal and 17g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil for cooking per 100g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of 80/20 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 254 kcal for raw 80/20 ground beef.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 8020 ground beef?
Does cooking change calories in 80/20 ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, cooking and draining fat reduces calories to ~204 kcal per 100g.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 8020 ground beef?
faqs.a: 20g total fat per 100g raw, with 7.7g saturated.
Yes, 0g carbs and high fat/protein make it suitable, but watch portions for calories.
